content: I'll start by shooting some urban landscapes with the Kodak Brownie, focusing on capturing the gritty, high-contrast look that's perfect for black and white film. Then, I'll switch to my rangefinder camera and shoot some candid street photography, taking advantage of its compact size and quiet shutter to get up close and personal with my subjects. Finally, I'll use my SLR camera to capture some portraits, experimenting with different lenses and aperture settings to create a variety of effects.
